title: Girlfriend Getaway
short_info: Enjoy an incredible day at our pool and evening out with your best lady friends at one the finest South Beach luxury locations.
long_info:
• 1,800 sq. ft. Penthouse with 3-bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms (1 king, 1 queen and 2 twin beds)

  • 1,500 sq. ft. outdoor terrace with 180 degree views of Miami Beach

  • Private elevator access

  • Wet Bar

  • Welcome Bottle of Champagne

  • Poolside Cabana for the day of your choosing with Fruit Platter and Bottle of Champagne

  • Limo pick-up and drop-off including - one stop at Miami's top lounges with drinks included, followed by VIP entrance to LIV nightclub for up to 6 ladies
seo_title: Girlfriend Getaway Offer | Offers at The Sagamore Hotel
seo_description: Enjoy an incredible day at our pool and evening out with your best lady friends at one the finest South Beach luxury locations - Sagamore Hotel South Beach.
